gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Suns 107, Hornets 96
gameRecap.excerpt: Phoenix defeats Charlotte, 107-96. For Phoenix, Devin Booker led the way with 21 points, six rebounds, and 11 assists while aided by Bradley Beal (15 points, six rebounds, seven assists) in the victory. Vasilije Micic finished with 21 points and three assists with Grant Williams adding 20 points (three 3PM) and six rebounds for Charlotte in the losing effort. Phoenix improves to 39-28, while Charlotte moves to 17-50 in the loss.
